ygData.messageBody:
hehe. whoops = )

i actually had this name picked out from the day i started, as a tribute to
the infamous Dr. Mindbender of GI Joe. that and it just sounds so fitting
for an enchanter, what with all the brain smoldering and such that we do = )

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 20th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 09:24 AM 5/26/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Mike Cummins" <pakrat77@...>
